str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To try, tempt, test. From peira; to test, i.e. Endeavor, scrutinize, entice, discipline.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
Desire, eagerness for, inordinate desire, lust. From epithumeo; a longing.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From ek and helkuo; to drag forth, i.e. to entice.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To allure, entice (by a bait). From the base of dolos; to entrap, i.e. delude.
